Rio_Rancho.KNMM:
KNMM (1150 AM) is a radio station licensed to Albuquerque, New Mexico, United States, the station serves the Albuquerque area. On December 1, 2016, the station was licensed to Sangre de Cristo Broadcasting Co., Inc., which owns four stations in the Las Vegas, New Mexico area.
In March 2015, the then-KDEF was granted an FCC construction permit to triplex at the KSVA/KRZY transmitter site.
